General.Name: Shaanxi Jinye Science Technology and Education Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Jinye Science Technology and Education Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sales of printed products in China. The company operates in seven segments: tobacco supporting industry, other printing industry, education industry, Internet business, trade, real estate industry, and others. It is involved in the production and sales of cigarette label printing, tobacco tows, and mouth sticks; printing and sales of other products; domestic and international commercial trade activities; development and sales of real estate properties, as well as property management activities. The company also offers general higher education at the undergraduate level; and wireless network services; and design and construction of computer network engineering. In addition, it operates Mingde College of Northwestern Polytechnical University, a full-time undergraduate college. Shaanxi Jinye Science Technology and Education Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yan  Kai
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
